transcript:

Executive: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: IndiaMart se do din se main business kara tha ek lead bhi nahi aaya daily do lead tum char lead tum bol ke bola
Executive: Sir ek bar aap company ka naam confirm kar sakte hain apna?
Customer: Gonta Venkanna hamara
Executive: Han
Customer: Bataye Gonta Venkanna
Executive: Spelling bol dijiye
Customer: Gonta Venkanna
Executive: Hello

Customer: 13899
Customer: 143065
Customer: G O N
Customer: G O
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji hanji
Customer: G O N Okay okay aapki services abhi live hui hai na IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Live ho yaar lekin lead bhi nahi aa raha na ek bhi
Executive: Ji ek second main aapka catalog open kariye ek minute line pe rahiyega
Customer: Daily teen char lead tum bola lead hai ek bhi nahi aa raha
Executive: Hmm hmm main dekh rahi hu ek minute rukiyega
Executive: Pan India deal kar sakte hain aap?
Customer: Pan India na ko mere AP Telangana bas hai
Executive: Only Telangana nearby na?
Customer: Ha Telangana AP Andhra Pradesh
Executive: Okay
Executive: Ek bar phone se use kar rahe hain aapki laptop laptop se use kar rahe hain sir IndiaMART ko?
Customer: Phone phone
Executive: Mobile me jayiyega ek bar
Customer: Ha
Executive: My leads pe gaye aur waha pe dekhiye option aa raha hoga recent ka sir aapko
Customer: Ek minute line pe raho
Executive: Hanji
Customer: Kuch bhi nahi bata raha idhar lead pe
Executive: My leads ke upar recent ka option aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Ha option aa raha hai
Executive: Thik hai recent pe click kariye
Customer: Hmm
Customer: Pehle main upar se aapne ha Telangana recent recent ka option aa raha hoga sir upar relevant aur recent ka
Customer: Ek minute ek minute ha relevant recent hai
Executive: Ha recent pe click kariye
Executive: Then location apni select kariye abhi India ek bar select karega India select karenge na to pure puri jagah ke lead dikhna start ho jayega aapko
Customer: India pe lekin ye Maharashtra udhar ka udhar ka nahi hai main apna Telangana ka AP ka kar lete hai
Executive: Okay AP aur Telangana mein na?
Customer: Ha aur hum aur hum hamara jo product hai wo keval matlab service providing ka hai kya ki koi material bhi send out kar sell karte hain hum?
Customer: Material sell nahi karte kal service karte hai demolition ka excavation ka kam karte hai hum log
Executive: Hmm
Customer: Ha construction service se related hai na?
Customer: Wo construction ka alag hai banane wala nahi hai hum todne wala hai khali
Executive: Okay
Customer: Ha
Customer: Mere ko AP Telangana pe demolition ka excavation ka lead aana bas utna hai
Executive: Hmm okay aapka jab service live hua hoga sir to team ki taraf se discuss hua kya lead ka leads wagera consume karai gayi thi aapko matlab jab aapka catalog ready hua hoga to jo team hai jo first time aapko onboard ki hogi sir
Executive: Unhone aapko by leads consume karwai hongi na sir aapke area ke ya aap jo bhi aapki preference hai
Customer: Pichhe ek local wala Hyderabad mein aake bana diya hai unko phone karna kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi koi local person ko call nahi karna hai main ye bol rahi hu ki team ki taraf se call aaya tha IndiaMART team ki taraf se aapko call aaya tha catalog jab aapka ban raha tha?
Customer: Ha
Executive: Achcha to catalog wagera jo design hua hai wo okay hai sir koi problem to nahi hai usme?
Customer: Mere ko ye check karo mere ko khali mera service kya hai demolition karne ka hai wo ye lagaya hai keyboard dusra lagaya wo mere profile mein
Executive: Yaha pe main bata deti hu kya kya keyword hai aapke catalog mein building demolition hai earth excavation service hai building construction hai building construction nahi hai
Customer: Construction nahi karte yaar hum log wo nikal do construction ka nikal do
Executive: Civil contractors
Customer: Ha okay chipping service
Customer: Ha okay dono nikal chipping service nikalo ye construction nikalo
Executive: Ha
Executive: Ha
Executive: Floor chipping nahi karte na hum?
Customer: Ha road ha road work karte hai hum
Executive: RCC demolition service
Customer: Ha wo to rehne do commercial building construction
Customer: Wo ha wo rehne do
Executive: Ye commercial building ka construction kar sakte hain aap?
Customer: Construction nahi karte demolition hai wo
Executive: Ha yaha pe kuch products aapke kuch products na aapke construction building construction se related hai
Customer: Ha kya bole?
Executive: Aapke catalog mein sir products jo hai na building construction se related bhi hai
Customer: To ye construction nikalna hai ye
Executive: Okay aapne nahi bataya tha humko ye add karne ke liye
Customer: Nahi bataya unho kaisa laga bacho ko bola raha idhar aake Hyderabad mein local banda aake banaya wo
Executive: Achcha ha ye mere ko ye kya kya keyword ek bar bata do
Customer: Thik hai ek bar
Executive: Kya kya keyword hai main bata rahi hu na sir aapko demolition service aapka ye add hai thik hai civil construction hai
Customer: Ha
Executive: Factory demolition service hai
Customer: Main main ye construction bole to construction bole to demolition ka banane ka hai wo
Executive: Hmm
Executive: Ek second rukiyega
Executive: Iske demolition ke alava aur koi bhi third category mein deal nahi karte aap hai na?
Customer: Demolition ka kam karte kal industrial ka ye commercial ka jo bhi hai house ka residential ka ye pura sara cheez ye demolition karte construction nahi banate ghar nahi banate hum
Executive: Main samajh gayi
Executive: Main samajh gayi sir aur keval jo hai Telangana aur Andhra Pradesh bas rahega
Customer: Ha dono rast mein bas rahega ha bas rahega dono rast mein bas rahega ye pura nako mere ko
Executive: Thik hai sir mujhe na thoda sa time dijiye isme thik hai kyuki jo aapka catalog jinse design hua tha aur kya matlab aur sales person jo aapke pass koi sales person aaya sir package ke liye?
Customer: Ha ha aaya aaya ek banda aaya
Executive: Achcha to aur kya kya unhone features bataye the sir IndiaMART ke bare mein aapko?
Customer: Jo bhi hai unko bola mare are yahi kam karte rahe aisa aisa bolte uska features bata ke chale gaye fir ye live hua to malum hua sab bolke chale gaye fir live ho gaya bola ab tak nahi mila unhe
Executive: Achcha nahi aapki service to live ho gayi hai sir lekin yaha pe jo problem aa rahi hai na main ek bar dekh leti hu hai na?
Customer: Dekh lo mere ko unhe bola kam se kam Hyderabad ka AP ka daily do lead deta hu bola abhi tak do din ho gaye live ho karke ek bhi nahi aaya aur ek cheez kya hai construction ka kam nahi karte hum kal demolition ka kam karte
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm nahi dekhiye leads jo hai na sir leads aati hai thik hai aisa nahi hai ki leads aati nahi hai but aap just abhi just live hua hai hai na aur yaha pe aap yaha pe dekhiye ki hamara ye check hai ki hum jo hai keval do hi state mein deal kar sakte hain aur hamara matlab ki product keval ek hi demolition wala product hai hai na matlab ki service keval
Executive: Ha ha wahi ha demolition ka excavation ka kam karte
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm to wahi cheez hai mere ko ek bar na review karne dijiye is bare mein main ek bar check kar leti hu apne side se thik hai jo bhi isme better solution hoga main aapko provide karungi sir okay?
Executive: Okay okay baki main aapko na ek bar apne personal number se text kar deti hu whatsapp pe taki aapko koi bhi problem ho to directly aap mere ko reach out kar sako okay?
Executive: Okay okay
Executive: Ji thank you sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received any buyleads.

- Wants to remove construction services from catalog.

- Wants leads only from Telangana and Andhra Pradesh.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the catalog and acknowledged the issues.

- Assured to review and provide a better solution.

- Will share personal number for direct communication.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will review and provide solution.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, demolition, construction, telangana, andhra pradesh
